quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.
author: Bernard M. Baruch

quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
author: Robert Frost

quote: If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
author: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire, J.K. Rowling

quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
author: This is My Story, Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
author: The Perks of Being a Wallflower, Stephen Chbosky

quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you...I could walk through my garden forever.
author: Alfred Tennyson

quote: The most beautiful makeup of a woman is passion. But cosmetics are easier to buy.
author: Yves Saint-Laurent

quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
author: What I Talk About When I Talk About Running, Haruki Murakami

quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us. And the world will live as one.
author: Imagine, John Lennon

quote: And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
author: The Alchemist, Paulo Coelho

quote: Itâ€™s no use going back to yesterday, because I was a different person then.
author: Alice in Wonderland, Lewis Carroll

quote: You can't stay in your corner of the Forest waiting for others to come to you. You have to go to them sometimes.
author: Winnie-the-Pooh, A.A. Milne

quote: The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, a hell of heaven..
author: Paradise Lost, John Milton

quote: When I'm running I don't have to talk to anybody and don't have to listen to anybody. This is a part of my day I can't do without.
author: What I Talk About When I Talk About Running, Haruki Murakami

quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
author: An Ideal Husband, Oscar Wilde

quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Most people are other people. Their thoughts are someone else's opinions, their lives a mimicry, their passions a quotation.
author: De Profundis, Oscar Wilde

quote: You will always be fond of me. I represent to you all the sins you never had the courage to commit.
author: The Picture of Dorian Gray, Oscar Wilde

quote: The very essence of romance is uncertainty.
author: The Importance of Being Earnest and Other Plays, Oscar Wilde

quote: It is absurd to divide people into good and bad. People are either charming or tedious.
author: Lady Windermere's Fan, Oscar Wilde

quote: Children begin by loving their parents; as they grow older they judge them; sometimes they forgive them.
author: The Picture of Dorian Gray, Oscar Wilde
